Summary: Northbound Q25 and Q65 buses are detoured due to LIRR construction project at 150th St/Archer Ave.
Description:
Northbound Q25 and Q65 buses are detoured due to LIRR construction project at 150th St/Archer Ave.
You may see a few extra turns, but no stops will be missed.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available/accurate while buses are detoured.

Summary: Southbound M101, M102 and M103 buses are skipping the stop on Lexington Ave at E 46th St; use the temporary stop on Lexington Ave at E 45th St instead
Description:
Southbound M101, M102 and M103 buses are skipping the stop on Lexington Ave at E 46th St; use the temporary stop on Lexington Ave at E 45th St instead
See a map of the boarding change.

What's happening?
Water main construction

Summary: Eastbound B8 stop on 18th Ave at 53rd St is closed; please use nearby stops on 18th Ave at 55th St or 50th St.

Summary: B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Description:
B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Buses start and end their trips at a temporary location on 2nd Ave at 37th St and make an eastbound stop on 37th St and 4th Ave at the existing B70 bus stop.
(See map)

What's happening?
NYC DEP Sewer Replacement

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area.

For M102 service, use the stops 3rd Ave at E 109th St or E 116th St at 3rd Ave. See a map of this stop change.

Construction

Summary: Westbound  Bx12, Bx12-SBS, and Bx22 buses are detoured because of NYPD activity on E Fordham Rd between Elm Pl and Marion Ave.
Description:
Westbound  Bx12, Bx12-SBS, and Bx22 buses are detoured because of NYPD activity on E Fordham Rd between Elm Pl and Marion Ave.
While detoured, buses will not make stops along E Fordham Rd from Elm Pl to Valentine Ave. 
Stops will be made as requested along Webster Ave and Grand Concourse.

accessibility icon The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside accessibility icon [7].

What's happening?We're replacing the elevators
